definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: Job 3:26 agitation, excitement, raging;—´[[ר]]: abs. Hb Hab 3:2 +, cstr. Job 37:2; sf. [[רָנְזֶךָָ]] Is 14:3;—raging Job 3:17; disquiet, turmoil Is 14:3, Job 3:26, Job 14:1; raging, wrath Hb Hab 3:2; [[קׂלוֹ]] ´[[ר]]: Job 37:2 rumbling of his voice (i.e. thunder); of excitement of warhorse, [[בְּרַעַשׁ וְרׂגֶּו]] Job 39:24.
